title: Todo-List with Authentication
description: The best Todo App you will find on the internet. Build on top of React and Node with Postgres Database.

title: Netflix Clone Application
description: The exact clone of Netflix application made from start with React and Node

title: Bubbles Social Media Application
description: The modified clone of Twitter with the ability to write bubbles on timeline. Build on top of React and Node with Firebase.

title: Filter Search Application
description: A simple filtering application based on ratings, company, product etc. with extra feature of searching with dates and search bar.

title: Pomodoro Clock Application
description: A simple pomodoro clock that is build with vanilla javascript.

title: Weather Application
description: This application helps to find the temperature and other weather information based on the city you enter.
